get.description: List all services in your clinic that match searching criteria.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: A part or the entire Service name you are searching for. Leaving it blank will result in a full list returned.

get.description: List all locations of your clinic that match searching criteria.

parameters.name: locationName
parameters.description: A part or the entire Location name you are searching for. Leaving it blank will result in a full list returned.

get.description: List all Packages, Memberships & Clinic Credits in your clinic that match searching criteria.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: A part or the entire Package, Membership or Clinic Credit name you are searching for. Leaving it blank will result in a full list returned.

get.description: List all products in your clinic inventory that match searching criteria.

parameters.name: productName
parameters.description: A part or the entire Inventory Item name you are searching for. Leaving it blank will result in a full list returned.

get.description: List all patients in your clinic that match searching criteria.

parameters.name: patientName
parameters.description: A part or the entire Patient name you are searching for. Leaving it blank will result in a full list returned.

get.description: List all clinic user accounts in your clinic that match searching criteria.

parameters.name: userName
parameters.description: A part or the entire User name you are searching for. Leaving it blank will result in a full list returned.

parameters.name: roles
parameters.description: A part or the entire role you are searching for. Leaving it blank will result in a full list returned.

get.description: List all therapist in your clinic that match searching criteria.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: A part or the entire User name you are searching for. Leaving it blank will result in a full list returned.

requestBody.description: Displays Checked In, In Progress, and Checked Out appointment information including all revenue earned.

startDate.description: Start date (DOS) of the finding range in your clinic time zone

endDate.description: End date (DOS) of the finding range in your clinic time zone

packagesMemberships.description: Package, Membership and Clinic Credit IDs got from(/api/masterdata/packages-memberships)

dateOfService.description: Date of service of the appointment

revenue.description: The revenue amount of the visit

adjustment.description: The adjusment for the invoice of the visit

collected.description: The collected amount of the visit

dueAmount.description: The due amount of the invoice

cpt.description: List of CPT used in the visit

startDate.description: Start date (DOS) of the finding range in your clinic time zone

endDate.description: End date (DOS) of the finding range in your clinic time zone

appointmentStatuses.description: The statuses of appointments you are looking for.

currentResponsibilities.description: The current PIC for the payment of the appointments you are looking for.

invoiceStatuses.description: The statuses of invoices of the appointments you are looking for.

providers.description: Clinic User IDs got from api (/api/masterdata/providers)

totalAppointments.description: Total appointment in the time range

totalCharges.description: Total amount charged in the time range

totalPayments.description: Total amount payment of the invoice in the time range

totalUnits.description: Total unit of the CPTs using

totalPatients.description: Total Patients having visit in the time range

averageCharges.description: Average Charges of the invoices in the time range

averagePayments.description: Average Payment of the invoices in the time range

invoiceNo.description: The unique code of the invoice

listInsurance.description: Whether or not a patient has insurance info registered.

fromYear.description: The start Year of your finding range.

toYear.description: The end Year of your finding range.

startDate.description: Start date of the finding range in your clinic time zone

endDate.description: End date of the finding range in your clinic time zone

startDate.description: Start date of the finding range in your clinic time zone

endDate.description: End date of the finding range in your clinic time zone

createdBy.description: The provider IDs who created the patient got from api (/api/masterdata/clinic-users)

firstSeenBy.description: The provider IDs first seen the patient got from api (/api/masterdata/therapists)

lastSeenBy.description: The provider IDs last see the patient got api (/api/masterdata/therapists)

accountAccess.description: Whether or not a patient has ever login to the system.

hasAppointments.description: Whether or not a patient has ever scheduled an appointment.

patientStatus.description: Whether a patient account is currently activated or not.

name.description: The provider name of Package and Membership

searchStr.description: Texts that filtered record may contain

startDate.description: Start date (DOS) of the finding range in your clinic time zone

endDate.description: End date (DOS) of the finding range in your clinic time zone

startTime.description: Start time (DOS) of the finding range in your clinic time zone

endTime.description: End time (DOS) of the finding range in your clinic time zone

pageSize.description: Number of records a page will display

403.description: You do not have permission to access the API.
